name: GLOBISH ACADEMIA (THAILAND) COMPANY LIMITED
description: Developer of an online learning platform designed to teach English. The company's platform offers online English courses, one-on-one coaching classes, e-learning programs, workshops, and language tests, enabling individuals and working professionals to speak, interact, and learn the English language at home.
one_liner: Developer of an online learning platform designed to teach English.
